akn:section.akn:heading: Repealed. Pub. L. 117–58, div. B, title I, § 21301(b)(1)(A), Nov. 15, 2021, 135 Stat. 683

akn:content.akn:p:
§§ 821 to 823. Repealed. Pub. L. 117–58, div. B, title I, § 21301(b)(1)(A), Nov. 15, 2021, 135 Stat. 683
Section 821, Pub. L. 94–210, title V, § 501, as added Pub. L. 105–178, title VII, § 7203(a)(1), June 9, 1998, 112 Stat. 471; amended Pub. L. 114–94, div. A, title XI, § 11602, Dec. 4, 2015, 129 Stat. 1693, defined terms for purposes of this subchapter. See section 22401 of Title 49, Transportation.
A prior section 821, Pub. L. 94–210, title V, § 501, Feb. 5, 1976, 90 Stat. 66; Pub. L. 95–620, title VIII, § 803(c)(1), Nov. 9, 1978, 92 Stat. 3347; Pub. L. 96–101, § 24(b), Nov. 4, 1979, 93 Stat. 747; Pub. L. 96–448, title IV, § 405(d), Oct. 14, 1980, 94 Stat. 1947; Pub. L. 97–35, title XI, § 1162(b), Aug. 13, 1981, 95 Stat. 684; Pub. L. 99–509, title IV, § 4033(c)(2), Oct. 21, 1986, 100 Stat. 1908, defined terms for purposes of this subchapter, prior to repeal by Pub. L. 105–178, title VII, § 7203(a)(1), June 9, 1998, 112 Stat. 471.
Section 822, Pub. L. 94–210, title V, § 502, as added Pub. L. 105–178, title VII, § 7203(a)(1), June 9, 1998, 112 Stat. 473; amended Pub. L. 109–59, title IX, § 9003(b)–(g), Aug. 10, 2005, 119 Stat. 1921–1923; Pub. L. 110–432, div. A, title VII, § 701(e), Oct. 16, 2008, 122 Stat. 4906; Pub. L. 114–94, div. A, title XI, §§ 11603–11605(a), 11606, 11607(a), 11608, 11609, Dec. 4, 2015, 129 Stat. 1694, 1695, 1697–1700; Pub. L. 116–94, div. H, title I, § 192, Dec. 20, 2019, 133 Stat. 2972; Pub. L. 116–159, div. B, title I, § 1104(b), Oct. 1, 2020, 134 Stat. 727, related to direct loans and loan guarantees. See section 22402 of Title 49, Transportation.
A prior section 822, Pub. L. 94–210, title V, § 502, Feb. 5, 1976, 90 Stat. 67; Pub. L. 95–620, title VIII, § 803(c)(2)–(4), Nov. 9, 1978, 92 Stat. 3347, related to the Rail Fund, prior to repeal by Pub. L. 105–178, title VII, § 7203(a)(1), June 9, 1998, 112 Stat. 471.
Section 823, Pub. L. 94–210, title V, § 503, as added and amended Pub. L. 105–178, title VII, § 7203(a)(1), (4), June 9
